org.whiteflag.protocol.core

Class WfMessageSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.whiteflag.protocol.core.WfMessageSegment

  • public class WfMessageSegment
extends java.lang.Object
    Whiteflag message segment class

    This is a class representing a segment of a Whiteflag message, such as a the message header or the message body. A message segment contains a number of message fields, depending on the part and the type of the message. This class is used to construct different message types with a single interface.
